column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Everything comes into play in the restaurant industry and because of that
column2: we price our products accordingly so that customers can get a sense of value and so our business remains profitable. We will never be all things to all people
column3: but I do appreciate your patronage. We will continue to seek and source more cost-efficient products
column4: as well as work with our corporate franchisor in the future to bring more value to the menu.
